text:
Netizens have a hilarious take on almost everything that happens in the world. However, this takes an even better twist when it comes to things related to the Indian film industry.
Be it DeepVeer wedding pictures or the leaked pictures from the sets, trust the internet to give you a hilarious take on almost everything. Something similar happened with recently leaked pictures of Ranbir Kapoor and his rumoured girlfriend Alia Bhatt.
Pinterest
The pictures from the sets made way on the internet and in no time, they went crazy viral. While some are speculating that they might be from a rehearsal scene from the film, netizens chose to give them their own twist.
From asking why Alia is so sad and sullen to pointing out that Ranbir was busy checking out his ex-girlfriend Deepika Padukone's pictures, the comments on these pictures are hilarious!
Don't Miss 336 SHARES 247 SHARES 699 SHARES 1.7 K SHARES 12.5 K SHARES
Screengrab
Screengrab
Screengrab
Screengrab
Ranbir and Alia's relationship has been the talk of the town for months now. The couple is currently shooting for Dharma Productions' Brahmastra.
title: Meme Brigade Reacts To Ranbir-Alia's Leaked Photos, Says He Could Be Checking Deepika's Wedding Pics
description: Something similar happened with recently leaked pictures of Ranbir Kapoor and his rumored girlfriend Alia Bhatt. The pictures from the sets made way on the internet and in no time, they went crazy viral. While some are speculating that they might be from a rehearsal scene from the film, netizens chose to give them their own twist.
